title: 6g report a bom in a utf-8 source program as syntax errors
body:
by **jjlemire**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. write a minimal source file with a BOM
2. compile
3.

What is the expected output?
with no syntax errors, the compiler produces the intermediate file

What do you see instead?
Many syntax errors

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Mac os x 10.6

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
e86b22981073 tip as off 2011/Jan/04 at 16:00 ET

Please provide any additional information below.
It should support BOM because many editors like Notepad + textWrangler insert the BOM.
The Chrome browser processes the BOM correctly.
